#include<iostream>
using namespace std ;
#include<cstdio>
#define gc getchar
using namespace std ;
void scanint(long long int &x)
{
    register long  long int c = gc();
    x = 0;
    for(;(c<48 || c>57);c = gc());
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
}
long long int gcd(long long int a,long long int b)
{
   long long int c =a%b;
  while(c != 0)
  {
    a = b;
    b = c;
    c = a % b;
  }
  return b;
}
int main()
{
long long int T ,RCUT ,mnsz,mnr_fctr,size,r_fctr,N,ACUT ,div,p,q;
scanint(T) ;
while(T--)
{
scanint(N) ;
scanint(mnsz) ;
scanint(mnr_fctr) ;
RCUT=0 ;
div=1 ;
for(long long int i=0;i<N;i++)
{
cin>>size ;
cin>>r_fctr ;
if(size>mnsz || r_fctr>mnr_fctr)
RCUT++ ;
}
scanint(ACUT) ; 
if(RCUT==0 )
{
cout<<"0/1"<<endl ;
continue ;
}
div=gcd(RCUT,ACUT) ;
p=RCUT/div ;
q=ACUT/div ;
cout<<p<<"/"<<q<<endl ;
}
//getch()  ;
return 0 ;
}
